Line1.BC3FE: They have nowhere else to go. Their families fled Jirandai to escape the horrors of the north, but the cannibals found them anyway.
Line3.BC3FE: Other travelers are in peril while those accursed flesh-eaters roam the roads. Should you thin their numbers, I can offer a portion of our tithes.
VoiceDir1.BC3FE: Saddened. Clearly pities the victims of the cannibals.
